Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Adjusts the compensation of formerly incarcerated individuals who were unjustly convicted
Summary: Retroactively adjusts the compensation of formerly incarcerated individuals who were unjustly convicted; exempts such adjusted income from state income taxes.
LawCode: Add §188, Cor L; amd §601, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the tax law, in relation to adjusting the earnings of formerly incarcerated individuals who were unjustly convicted
